trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 和更高版本中受支持]

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the next blocking garbage collection compacts the large object heap (LOH).
trans-unit.target: 指示下一个阻塞垃圾回收是否压缩大型对象堆 (LOH)。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is a member of the <xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode> enumeration that indicates whether the next full blocking garbage collection also compacts the large object heap (LOH).
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是成员的<xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode>枚举，该值指示是否下一个完整的阻碍性垃圾回收还会压缩大型对象堆 (LOH)。

trans-unit.source: By default, the LOH is not compacted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将不会压缩 LOH。

trans-unit.source: A value of CompactOnce indicates that the blocking garbage collection will compact the LOH.
trans-unit.target: CompactOnce 表示阻碍性垃圾回收会将压缩 LOH。

trans-unit.source: After the garbage collection, the value of the <xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property reverts to Default.
trans-unit.target: 垃圾回收的值后<xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性将恢复为默认值。

trans-unit.source: The large object heap (LOH) will be compacted during the next blocking generation 2 garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 下一次阻止第 2 代垃圾回收期间将压缩大型对象堆 (LOH)。

trans-unit.source: The large object heap (LOH) is not compacted.
